segments.text: How much is your last salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have earned 10,000 a year including bonuses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do you want us to pay you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to be paid more than that . Hopefully , 150,000 a year . To be honest , I left the company to get more income .
segments.speaker: S2
